explanation: The stage direction describes a character tearing up their tickets ('billets') while focusing on the description of the meal. This action emphasizes the handling and manipulation of an object (the tickets), so it falls under the 'object' category, which pertains to interactions with specific items.
stgdir: Pendant ce couplet il déchire , sans y faire attention, tous ses billets pour compléter la description du repas qu'il fait.
